content: per inch cast on 58 sts 7 sts per inch cast on 64 sts round 1 *k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 7 75 sts per inch cast on 70 sts repeat from * once more 8 25 sts per inch cast on 74 sts round 2 knit 8 5 sts per inch cast on 76 sts work rnds 1 & 2 until about 62% of your original sts remain work round 1 decrease round only until you have 32-34% of your cast on sts for your size and gauge original st count remaining or desired number of toe sts work in 2x2 rib for desired ankle/cuff length before beginning strong heel finishing place markers to divide the instep and heel stitches remember the heel is worked over 2x2 ribbing so you will graft the top and bottom sts together using kitchener stitch need a multiple of 4+2 sts in the heel section to make the stockinette see stitch guide instructions work if that doesn t work you may consider doing a 1x1 ribbing or working stockinette stockinette will not produce as fi tted a heel round 1 k1 m1 work in established 2x2 ribbing to 1 st before marker m1 k1 sm knit to end of round round 2 k1 work new st into ribbing pattern work in shoe size guide established rib to last 2 sts work new st into ribbing pattern k1 sm knit to end work new stitch into ribbing pattern you want to keep the fl ow of the 2x2 ribbing to do this the m1 sts will need to become either a knit or a purl on the following round the m1s on the fi rst increase round will become knit sts the m1s on the next 2 rnds be- come purl sts then the m1s on the next 2 rnds become knits etc always keep the fi rst and last st of the heel section as knit sts repeat rnds 1 and 2 until the heel section has 6 sts fewer than double the original heel section st count round 3 k1 m1 knit to 1 st before marker m1 k1 sm knit to end of round round 4 knit rnds 5 & 6 as rnds 3 & 4 heel section now has 2 sts fewer than double the original heel section st count the vanilla sock movement page 3 www fiddleknits com pattern is for personal use only do not redistribute abbreviations round round * indicates a repeat in sm slip marker pattern st s stitch es k knit st st stockinette stitch k2tog knit 2 together yo yarn over m1 make 1 increase pm place marker stitch guide m1 m1 lifted increase k2tog knit 2 together pick up the bar running between the stitch on your left and knit the first two stitches on left needle together as you right needle place it on your left needle front to back knit it would one stitch one stitch
